meanings.definition: relating to education beyond high school
meanings.sent1: The postsecondary courses offer specialized training for various careers.
meanings.sent2: She pursued postsecondary studies to become a nurse.
meanings.sent3: The postsecondary programs made learning fun and engaging.
meanings.sent4: His postsecondary journey was a stepping stone to a successful career.
meanings.sent5: Attending postsecondary institutions opens doors to new opportunities.

meanings.definition: occurring or existing after high school
meanings.sent1: The postsecondary events celebrate achievements beyond high school.
meanings.sent2: Many friendships are formed during postsecondary years.
meanings.sent3: The postsecondary parties were always full of energy and excitement.
meanings.sent4: His postsecondary experiences shaped his future decisions.
meanings.sent5: Postsecondary milestones mark important transitions in life.
